profileAlternative.name: Tarek Moukhtar
profileAlternative.headline: Oracle Middleware and Java Team Lead at TRUEMEGA Technology Solutions
profileAlternative.summary:
Since my graduation in June 2007, have more than 9 years of extensive hands on experience of software development on different platforms using different Oracle Java and Fusion Middleware technologies.

Experienced team lead and team player with excellent communication and interpersonal skills who has the ability to work independently under pressure.

Currently working as Oracle Middleware Lead / Project Technical Lead at Raya International Services (RIS).

B.Sc. of computer science in 2007, the faculty of computers and information of Cairo University, Egypt.
ITI state-of-art 9-month scholarship diploma, Intake 30 in 2010, within the Java Enterprise track.

egabi Solutions

Responsible for software solutions delivery, team leading, architecture.

End-to-end life cycle developer/team leader using Java and Oracle Middleware Stack to provide quality services to our clients.

educations.title: Faculty of computers and information of Cairo university

given.text: Tarek is a very dedicated hard worker, and sincerely focused on success. I'm very lucky that I have worked with him, and I hope he goes on and continues to weave his success story.

I can recommend Tarek as a person with great recognition and deep proficiency of business solutions. Tarek did not fail a single time. Tarek is an innovative employee. Reliable and energetic team player who can be trusted. , His knowledge is vast and thorough. Tarek follows the best IT guidelines. Has a strong experience in areas such as Oracle SOA Suite, BPM and software architecture.
…
See more
Tarek helped me alot to learn J2ME, he's a very good developer and a very helpful person.
Tarek has features such as dependability , Honesty , Willing to Work , flexibility
Tarek is a hard worker. He is a committed , self organized with good personality and Tarek also is very adaptive with any new technology or environment.
Tarek is a smart person, skilled in java and deeply understand it. he is professional, well organized and good team mate.

I have had a pleasure of knowing Tarek and working with him in the same team on the faculty. He is intelligent and careful developer. Open minded and great expert. Deadline oriented and very good programmer.

received.text: Marwa did an exceptional job on the project i had worked in with her. Her conception, wonderful work flow, creativity and understanding of change requests made the project a dream. I would highly recommend her to anyone anywhere in the world. Marwa not only exceeded the brief, but gave group members a valuable insight to her thinking & methodology by instructing and coaching. I found Marwa also to be friendly, articulate & a great person to work with & would recommend her to anyone looking for someone professional,workaholic,self-motivated and have excellent leadership skills that include different motivation techniques. I have learnt a lot from her on both technical and non-technical levels.I wish someday we will be able to work together again.

Karim, is very self-disciplined guy tries to keep everything in control with a crystal clear line of sight.He prefers to use his brain and gained experience instead of using default patterns in testing that's apparently clear in the number and type of bugs and defects he opens on software developers. I'm really having all the fun working with Karim as keeping a SMART one :)

items: ADSIC NOC (Abu Dhabi No Objections Certificates)
